div.a: When Did God Get Into The Wedding Business?

div.div: Was marriage originally a legal or a religious institution?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UzNkk5&via=Digg&text=When Did God Get Into The Wedding Business?

div.a: The Woman Behind GoDaddy's Controversial Super Bowl Ads

div.div: Whether or not you’ve ever bought a web domain, you probably know GoDaddy.com from its annual Super Bowl commercials. They’re the ones that typically feature racecar driver Danica Patrick or another attractive woman in an advanced state of undress, gyrating, often for no obvious reason. And they're produced by a woman.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VVWN29&via=Digg&text=The Woman Behind GoDaddy's Controversial Super Bowl Ads

div.a: A Guinness Judge Explains How Record Waves Are Measured

div.div: On January 28, remarkable photo and video footage appeared that showed Garrett McNamara sliding down a mammoth peak at Nazaré, Portugal. Within hours there were reports that the wave might have shattered McNamara’s own record of 78 feet to reach a sky-scraping 100. But how can you really know how big it was?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XHuxj9&via=Digg&text=A Guinness Judge Explains How Record Waves Are Measured

div.a: Violent Death On A Sunday Afternoon

div.div: "I have never been to war, but bullfighting as an approximation for it only makes sense to me in that both activities are draped in flags and often based on antiquated ideas."

div.a: Granddaughter Of Infamous Westboro Baptist Church Founder Blogs About Leaving Church

div.div: "Up until now, our names have been synonymous with 'God Hates Fags.' Any twelve-year-old with a cell phone could find out what we did."

div.a: Why Do Diet Coke And Mentos React?

div.div: Combine Diet Coke and Mentos, and the result is explosive—Diet Coke shoots out of the bottle like a miniature, sticky Old Faithful. The reaction is so intense, you can make a rocket propelled by the resulting geyser. But what's the science behind this reaction?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11pEUOW&via=Digg&text=Why Do Diet Coke And Mentos React?

div.a: The Grammys Have Banned Sideboobs, 'Puffy' Genitals

div.div: CBS has issued a "Wardrobe Advisory" in advance of the show this Sunday. Apparently, they're worried everyone is just going to show up naked.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VE5jAO&via=Digg&text=The Grammys Have Banned Sideboobs, 'Puffy' Genitals

div.div: AH, TO BE YOUNG AND INSANE

div.div: Most consumers are still more likely to be hacked or scammed on their traditional computers, experts say, but the growing numbers of Android smartphones with known security flaws offer an increasingly ripe target for criminals.

div.div: ALL THE NEWS THAT'S FIT TO BURY

div.a: Why Did Major News Organizations Help Keep A CIA Drone Base A Secret?

div.div: We would all like to know as much as we can about the Obama Administration's top-secret program of assassinating U.S. citizens with drones, so we can figure out how best not to get assassinated. But don't look to the pages of U.S. newspapers, which cooperated with the Administration to cover-up the location of a key drone base.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYe23F&via=Digg&text=Why Did Major News Organizations Help Keep A CIA Drone Base A Secret?
